text.language: Ebolqen Iermiac pip~rov/t/c: e~repefc~mou eyouab swpi neman a~m/n efjw m~moc:
A reading from Jeremiah the prophet. May his holy blessings be with us. Amen.
Pembacaan dari Kitab Yeremia sang Nabi, kiranya berkat berkat-nya beserta kita. Amin.
من أرميا النبي بركته المقدسة تکون معنا. آمين.
